name: A'Sharad
description:
No mouse controls, this is for the game to feel more retro.

W, A, S, D to move
Q to attack
E to deflect
Enter to select or continue
Escape to pause and to unpause

This game has been created for educational purposes only as it has been made for a school project. There will be no revenue collected from this game and all Star Wars and copyrighted ideas projected in this title has been credited to Disney/Lucas Arts.
